mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PURCHASE (PUR_NUM, PUR_STATENUM, PUR_IMPID, PUR_MERCHANTID, PUR_USER_ID, PUR_USER_NAME, PUR_PURCHASEDATE, PUR_BOOKINGDATE, PUR_ACT_TITLE, PUR_OPT_NAME_1, PUR_OPT_NAME_2, PUR_OPT_NAME_3, PUR_OPT_NAME_4, PUR_OPT_COUNT_1, PUR_OPT_COUNT_2, PUR_OPT_COUNT_3, PUR_OPT_COUNT_4, PUR_PRICE ) VALUES ( #{pur_num}, #{pur_statenum}, #{pur_impId}, #{pur_merchantId}, #{pur_user_id}, #{pur_user_name}, #{pur_purchaseDate}, #{pur_bookingDate}, #{pur_act_title}, #{pur_opt_name_1}, #{pur_opt_name_2}, #{pur_opt_name_3}, #{pur_opt_name_4}, #{pur_opt_count_1}, #{pur_opt_count_2}, #{pur_opt_count_3}, #{pur_opt_count_4}, #{pur_price} )
